nodes.effect: shoots things high in the air

makes a person happy and giddy

makes the target blend into the surroundings
cause a person's ear to shrivel
hard to control large fire curse
finishes spell in the caster's area
multiplies and burns objects upon touch
allows user to write on objects
makes it easier to hold things
lets a person track another's movement on a map
allows wizard to put their soul into an object
shoots a fireball from caster's wand
glues opponent's tongue to roof of mouth
allows caster to read the mind of the target
hangs target upside down by feet
creates ball of light that can brighten a room for a long period of time
creates a strong beam of light from the wand
causes weather effect spells to stop
prevents nearby people from listening to conversations
counter to Lumos, turns off light
makes fireworks from the wand tip
causes items to permanently stick to things
animates statues and suits of armor
when sibling wands duel, the weaker wand shows all recently cast spells
cause spells to reflect back to the sender
returns items to original size. counters Engorgio
causes target to laugh and defeats Boggarts
causes wounds as if slashed by a sword
reveals hidden secrets or magical properties
a vow that if broken, kills you
